
public class arithmetic {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int x = 5;
		int y = 10;
		int a = x + y * 2;
		System.out.println("The value of x + y * 2 is " + a);
		int b = x - y + 2;
		System.out.println("The value of x - y + 2 is " + b);
		int c = (x+y) * 2;
		System.out.println("The value of (x+y) * 2 is " + c);
		int d = y % x ;
		System.out.println("The value of y % x is " + d);
				
	}

}
